metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9149 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Metadata Anonymisation Toolkit (MAT) 0.6 and 0.6.1 silently fails to perform "Clean metadata" actions upon invocation from the Nautilus contextual menu, which allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitive information by reading a file for which cleaning had been attempted.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9149` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mat - 0.6.1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mat package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-4').
